results.transliteration_ground_truth: l ṯfl bn frʾ bn frd w qbr bny -h b h- mẓr
results.translation_ground_truth: By Ṯfl son of Frʾ son of Frd and he buried his sons at the lookout point.

The surrounding rocks and boulders are also of a similar dark gray color and have a rough, weathered appearance. They appear to be part of a larger geological formation, and it is possible that the rock with the scratch or engraving is a part of this formation as well.

Overall, the image suggests that the rock with the scratch or engraving is an important or significant object, possibly due to its age or cultural significance. However, without further context or information, it is difficult to determine the exact nature or purpose of the marks on the rock.
